snippet.title: [GAME TRAILER] Spotless, The Clean 'Em Up RogueLite Available on Steam
snippet.description:
Clean, Clash, and Collect through 30+ spooky sites in this Single-Player, Clean 'Em Up Rogue-Lite. Spend your meager earnings wisely on both permanent and temporary upgrades, so that even the thriving haunts of cute and creepy creatures can’t stop you from cleaning 'til everything's Spotless!

Steam Page (free demo available!): https://store.steampowered.com/app/2638610/Spotless/

Follow us on X/Bluesky/Instagram @GhostieGamesDev
